item.title: Todo do about this hugo blog
item.author: ykhorizon@gmail.com (ykhorizon)
item.description: Wanted Features hugo hierarchy categories The categories of hugo is only one-level (It’s call Taxonomies). But I want the categories like the following image. It’s very common feature in another static site generator hexo morris821028 I had survey some feasible method to fitting my requirement. But it’s still under solving. Method 1 Use a prefix string as main category - Implement with simple concatenated category string

item.title: Design Automated Irrigation System S1
item.author: ykhorizon@gmail.com (ykhorizon)
item.description: Concepts before start Before we start to do the works (no matter design or implement), we need to set up our mind set and objectives. It can prevent us from wasting effort. MVP, Minimum Viable Product minimum viable product (MVP) is a product with just enough features to gather validated learning about the product and its continued development. For startups, how to know the enough features is a art.

item.description: This artictle is a quick note for making unity3D simple UI Make a rough UI layout quickly! ![]() Free Art Collection http://opengameart.org/content/breakout-graphics-no-shadow ####Keyword Drag and Drop Unity Tutorial - Drag & Drop Tutorial #1 [RPGs, Card Games, uGUI]

item.title: Dripping Prototype Experiment
item.author: ykhorizon@gmail.com (ykhorizon)
item.description: Prefix I want to know about how dripping flow inf Purpose Hardware & Experiment Setup I use arduino UNO R3 as A/D converter to transfer decagon EC-5 soil moisture sensor. The experiment set is measure by 3 sensor with 15 cm, 30 cm and 45 cm in container Result
